title: Ability to export console errors with key stroke or with button
body: When using the console to debug often times there can be hundreds (even though many are the same) I would like to be able to export that log to more easily read through the issues.

comments.body: The ability to save the log (to a file) or at the least copy the log so I can paste to a notepad and save seems very basic. Very surprised that I cannot select many log rows/entries and copy them.
I agree this would be a useful tool.
